title: Pangolin Project Manager
body:
Hey everyone, due to the nature and confusion around how Snapshot works there have been a lot of people who haven't been able to vote.
This is because Snapshot takes a Snapshot at the time of the proposal, so if you didn't hold PNG at that time or if you had your PNG in a Liquidity Pool, then you were unable to vote.
Because of this I'm putting up a fresh vote to ensure everyone has an opportunity to vote.
Here's the governance post for everyone
https://gov.pangolin.exchange/t/pangolin-project-manager/1221
author: 0x72C397908Cb93d1B569BBB0Ff8d3D26B7b21d730
